fields.name: Executioner
fields.description: This is a purely python based game, inspired by Hangman

This is my first role after my degree, I worked in multiple sectors as a lab analyst. I am trained in reviewing all types of drugs in a variation of tests as well as performing them. I was the subject matter expert for multiple products and tests.

I was a deviation author for the lab, so if something goes wrong or we get a result that is not what it should look like, I investigate it, find a root cause if possible and test to see if my root cause hypothesis was correct.

I am the quality representative for the packaging integrated process team. I deal with quality issues as well as assist with drug release, investigations and complaint management. It's a fun but tough job

This is my first introduction into an IT based role whilst still being involved within Quality Assurance. I look after the lab software making sure they are compliant to all GMP and quality regualtions.

This was a very fun degree, the modules I undertook were as follows: (it's a long list)
Organic, inorganic, organometallic, quantum and medicinal & pharmaceutical chemistry, computational drug design, chromatography, molecular spectroscopy, separation methods, data and elemental analysis, inorganic synthesis, Shlenk line, hydrogen rig, NMR theory, hyperpolarisation.

This is my first adventure into coding and understanding how code works. I've undertaken many projects, learned a lot of new skills, learned and worked in agile environments and finally made a lot of friends on the way! I am currently learning how to work with both the front and back end in conjunction.
